column5: Can anyone give me any insight on whether or not there are any major (or any) road construction projects underway when traveling between Sault Ste Marie and Nakina? Main roads only of course. Many thanks!

this website is excellent for up to date construction on Ont highways, when you see a red icon on a highway click on it for further info. enter town at top to locate your view closer to where you are interested. https://511on.ca/
